title: The Enchanted
description: It is 1881 and Amelia Equiano is now 22 years old with a lifetime of revenge to administer, however her weapon is neither a blade nor a bullet. Instead, she has an extraordinary ability to manipulate the minds and dreams of the guilty.With Wilbert at her side, Amelia eventually travels from London to San Francisco to avenge the crimes committed against her family.*Please note that the language/spelling of this novel is English (UK)*
author: Tami Egonu
